widget.header: Antonio Gonzalez Won 1st Place at a National-Level Technology Contest

config: Kava is a Mental Health Information System developed by a multidisciplinary team from the Academic Units of Psychology and Electrical Engineering at the Autonomous University of Zacatecas. Juan Antonio González, a FrontEnd Intern at Justia Mexico, is part of the forenamed team. The team recently participated in ExpoCiencias Nacional 2022 and was granted international accreditation to participate in the "Encuentro de Jóvenes Investigadores," Spain 2023.
